page.title: 17Housing mobility survey.
page.content: Survey of pupils, shows how many homes they have lived in.( Pupils aged 8-11 and 11-15 in the final school.) {Same one two three four { home other other other other Portland { 19% 34% 29% 12% 6% Our Lady { 4% 28% 15% 9% 44% Bidston {30% 25% 17% 16% 12% St.Joseph {30% 38% 22% 6% 4% Ridgeway {26% 32% 16% 11% 15% ___ ___ ___ ___ ___ { 22% 31% 20% 11% 16% { }___ ___ ___ ___ ___ { Note:}Figures for school two in North End of Birkenhead_Older and poor area. Much greater movement occurs compared with other areas.Possibly rehousing to new estates(further from the town),and due to difficulties in adapting, some moved back nearer town .In older areas close communities were common.See the section on{attitudes to house planners
